format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(MASS)
library(boot)
library(leaps)
library(glmnet)
library(pls)
ppp <- read_csv("PPP details.csv")
glimpse(ppp)
```

```{r}
ppp <- ppp |>
  dplyr::select( 
    `Amount forgiven`, 
    Payroll, 
    Rent, 
    Utilities, 
    `Health Care`, 
    `Mortgage Interest`, 
    `Debt Interest`, 
    `Refinancing EIDL`, 
    `Business type`, 
    Industry, 
    `Age of business`, 
    `Borrower zip`, 
    `Jobs reported`, 
    Gender, Race
  ) |>
  mutate(Industry = as_factor(Industry),
         `Age of business` = as_factor(`Age of business`),
         `Business type` = as_factor(`Business type`),
         Gender = as_factor(Gender),
         Race = as_factor(Race),
         `Borrower zip` = as.factor(str_remove(`Borrower zip`, "-.+"))) |>
  na.omit()

glimpse(ppp)
```

```{r}
car::vif(lm(`Amount forgiven` ~ ., ppp))
```

```{r}
X <- model.matrix(lm(`Amount forgiven` ~ ., ppp))[,-1]

set.seed(1234)
ridge_ppp <- cv.glmnet(X, ppp$`Amount forgiven`, alpha = 0)
plot(ridge_ppp)
ridge_ppp$lambda.min
min(ridge_ppp$cvm)
```

```{r}
# Lasso Regression
set.seed(1234)
lasso_ppp <- cv.glmnet(X, ppp$`Amount forgiven`, alpha = 1)
plot(lasso_ppp)
lasso_ppp$lambda.min
min(lasso_ppp$cvm)
coef(lasso_ppp)
```
